title: 'I just can’t feel sympathy for him': Torrent of hate at health insurers after CEO’s murder in US
content: A UnitedHealthcare executive was shot dead in Manhattan. The incident triggered public anger against the US health insurance industry. Words on the bullet casings hinted at healthcare grievances. Social media exploded with discussions about denied claims and high costs. The industry now faces scrutiny over its practices and security measures.
summary: A UnitedHealthcare executive was shot dead in Manhattan. The incident triggered public anger against the US health insurance industry. Words on the bullet casings hinted at healthcare grievances. Social media exploded with discussions about denied claims and high costs. The industry now faces scrutiny over its practices and security measures.

title: Texas attorney burns son's body after fatally shooting him
content: A 68-year-old Houston attorney, Michael C. Howard, is facing murder charges after fatally shooting his 20-year-old son, Mark, who had Down syndrome. Howard claimed he mistook his son for an intruder at his East Texas property. He then burned the body on a woodpile and waited 17 hours to report the incident. Howard's bond is set at $20 million.
summary: A 68-year-old Houston attorney, Michael C. Howard, is facing murder charges after fatally shooting his 20-year-old son, Mark, who had Down syndrome. Howard claimed he mistook his son for an intruder at his East Texas property.  He then burned the body on a woodpile and waited 17 hours to report the incident.  Howard's bond is set at $20 million.

title: 'Want to become virgin again': Influencer to spend $19k on surgery to restore virginity, doctor warns of risks
content: A 23-year-old influencer will spend $19,000 on surgery to restore her virginity. The procedure, hymenoplasty, reconstructs the hymen. A doctor warns of risks like infections and scarring.
summary: A 23-year-old influencer will spend $19,000 on surgery to restore her virginity. The procedure, hymenoplasty, reconstructs the hymen.  A doctor warns of risks like infections and scarring.

title: Turkey, Iran and Russia to meet in Doha on Saturday to discuss Syria, Turkish source says
content: Foreign ministers from Turkey, Iran, and Russia are set to convene in Doha this Saturday to address the recent surge by Syrian rebels. The rebels have achieved significant territorial gains, capturing Aleppo and Hama.
summary: Foreign ministers from Turkey, Iran, and Russia are set to convene in Doha this Saturday to address the recent surge by Syrian rebels. The rebels have achieved significant territorial gains, capturing Aleppo and Hama.

title: 'You're welcome': Trump after Bitcoin hits $100,000 mark
content: US President-elect Donald Trump on Thursday took credit for bitcoin's historic surge past $100,000, telling his social media followers "you're welcome" after the cryptocurrency jumped more than 50 percent since his election victory. Bitcoin broke $100,000 for the first time Thursday after Trump nominated cryptocurrency backer Paul Atkins to head the US securities regulator, reinforcing optimism the incoming president will deregulate the sector.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump on Thursday took credit for bitcoin's historic surge past $100,000, telling his social media followers "you're welcome" after the cryptocurrency jumped more than 50 percent since his election victory. Bitcoin broke $100,000 for the first time Thursday after Trump nominated cryptocurrency backer Paul Atkins to head the US securities regulator, reinforcing optimism the incoming president will deregulate the sector.

title: America’s Got Talent semi-finalist Kabir Singh passes away at 39
content: Indian-origin comedian Kabir Singh, known for his appearance on America's Got Talent, passed away at 39. He was found dead in his sleep on Wednesday, December 5th. While authorities suspect natural causes due to prior health issues, investigations are ongoing pending toxicology reports. Funeral services are scheduled for December 14th in Hayward, California.
summary: Indian-origin comedian Kabir Singh, known for his appearance on America's Got Talent, passed away at 39.  He was found dead in his sleep on Wednesday, December 5th. While authorities suspect natural causes due to prior health issues, investigations are ongoing pending toxicology reports. Funeral services are scheduled for December 14th in Hayward, California.

title: Who was Glenn Litton? Homeless man shot two children at California school before taking his own life
content: Glenn Litton, a 56-year-old homeless man with a criminal history and mental health issues, opened fire at a California Seventh-Day Adventist school, critically injuring two young boys. Litton, claiming to be part of an "international alliance," left a note citing America's global involvement as justification. He then used a ghost gun to shoot the children before taking his own life.
summary: Glenn Litton, a 56-year-old homeless man with a criminal history and mental health issues, opened fire at a California Seventh-Day Adventist school, critically injuring two young boys. Litton, claiming to be part of an "international alliance," left a note citing America's global involvement as justification. He then used a ghost gun to shoot the children before taking his own life.

title: Iran conducts successful space launch in program long criticised by West
content: Iran launched a satellite-carrying rocket using its Simorgh program, a move the West believes bolsters its missile technology. This launch, amidst heightened Middle East tensions, comes after the expiration of UN missile sanctions. While Iran insists on peaceful intentions, concerns remain about its nuclear capabilities and past military nuclear program.
summary: Iran launched a satellite-carrying rocket using its Simorgh program, a move the West believes bolsters its missile technology.  This launch, amidst heightened Middle East tensions, comes after the expiration of UN missile sanctions. While Iran insists on peaceful intentions, concerns remain about its nuclear capabilities and past military nuclear program.

title: 'Division is one of the greatest challenges of our time,' says Barack Obama at democracy forum
content: Former President Barack Obama addressed divisiveness in his first post-election speech, calling it a major challenge. He emphasized the importance of building alliances and coalitions for lasting change, even with those holding differing views. Obama acknowledged limits to compromise when fundamental justice is threatened, citing historical figures who championed pluralism. He urged collaborative action for a more just society.
summary: Former President Barack Obama addressed divisiveness in his first post-election speech, calling it a major challenge. He emphasized the importance of building alliances and coalitions for lasting change, even with those holding differing views.  Obama acknowledged limits to compromise when fundamental justice is threatened, citing historical figures who championed pluralism. He urged collaborative action for a more just society.

title: World's oldest-known wild bird lays egg in Hawaii at age 74
content: Wisdom, a 74-year-old Laysan albatross and the world's oldest known wild bird, has laid another egg at the Midway Atoll National Wildlife Refuge. This is believed to be her 60th egg and her first in four years. While her longtime mate Akeakamai is missing, Wisdom has been seen with a new partner.
summary: Wisdom, a 74-year-old Laysan albatross and the world's oldest known wild bird, has laid another egg at the Midway Atoll National Wildlife Refuge. This is believed to be her 60th egg and her first in four years. While her longtime mate Akeakamai is missing, Wisdom has been seen with a new partner.

title: Elon Musk donated over $260 Million to support Donald Trump’s 2024 campaign: Report
content: Elon Musk donated over $261.5 million to support Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign, primarily through his super PAC, America PAC. He also funded groups linking Trump's abortion stance to Ruth Bader Ginsburg and encouraging Robert F. Kennedy Jr. supporters to vote for Trump. Now, Musk is part of Trump's transition team, co-leading the Department of Government Efficiency with Vivek Ramaswamy.
summary: Elon Musk donated over $261.5 million to support Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign, primarily through his super PAC, America PAC.  He also funded groups linking Trump's abortion stance to Ruth Bader Ginsburg and encouraging Robert F. Kennedy Jr. supporters to vote for Trump.  Now, Musk is part of Trump's transition team, co-leading the Department of Government Efficiency with Vivek Ramaswamy.

title: Canada gun ban: Additional 324 military-style firearms barred, explores donation to Ukraine amid growing tensions
content: Canada banned 324 additional firearm models deemed more suitable for warfare than sport or hunting, intending to donate some to Ukraine. This expands on a 2020 ban and includes an amnesty period for owners. The move, preceding the École Polytechnique tragedy's anniversary, aims to curb gun violence, but faces criticism for impacting licensed owners.
summary: Canada banned 324 additional firearm models deemed more suitable for warfare than sport or hunting, intending to donate some to Ukraine.  This expands on a 2020 ban and includes an amnesty period for owners.  The move, preceding the École Polytechnique tragedy's anniversary, aims to curb gun violence, but faces criticism for impacting licensed owners.

title: California governor Gavin Newsom calls Trump's tariffs on Mexico and Canada 'betrayal'
content: California Governor Gavin Newsom criticized President-elect Trump's proposed tariffs on Mexico and Canada, calling them a "betrayal" and harmful to California's economy. He highlighted the importance of cross-border trade and announced plans to bolster border security against fentanyl and illegal weapons while seeking funds for legal defense against potential lawsuits from the incoming Trump administration.
summary: California Governor Gavin Newsom criticized President-elect Trump's proposed tariffs on Mexico and Canada, calling them a "betrayal" and harmful to California's economy.  He highlighted the importance of cross-border trade and announced plans to bolster border security against fentanyl and illegal weapons while seeking funds for legal defense against potential lawsuits from the incoming Trump administration.

title: Elon Musk: The world’s richest man is now America’s biggest political donor
content: Elon Musk spent over $274 million in the 2024 election, primarily backing Donald Trump's successful presidential bid. His funding, channeled through America PAC, supported Trump's campaign activities and targeted advertising. Musk's significant investment made him the largest donor of the cycle, surpassing all others, and secured him a prominent advisory role in the incoming Trump administration.
summary: Elon Musk spent over $274 million in the 2024 election, primarily backing Donald Trump's successful presidential bid.  His funding, channeled through America PAC, supported Trump's campaign activities and targeted advertising.  Musk's significant investment made him the largest donor of the cycle, surpassing all others, and secured him a prominent advisory role in the incoming Trump administration.

title: US President-elect Donald Trump wins 'Patriot of the Year' award at Fox Nation event
content: At the Fox Nation Patriot Awards, Donald Trump received the "Patriot of the Year" award. He praised Fox and celebrated his election victory. The event honored various patriots, including veterans and first responders. Trump's increased public appearances signal a renewed relationship with Fox after previous tensions.
summary: At the Fox Nation Patriot Awards, Donald Trump received the "Patriot of the Year" award.  He praised Fox and celebrated his election victory.  The event honored various patriots, including veterans and first responders.  Trump's increased public appearances signal a renewed relationship with Fox after previous tensions.

title: 'Biden admin is trying to leave Trump as bad legacy as it can': Russia
content: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov accused the Biden administration of escalating the Ukraine conflict to hinder the Trump administration. Lavrov claimed the US might shift focus to other matters, leaving Europe to deal with Ukraine.
summary: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov accused the Biden administration of escalating the Ukraine conflict to hinder the Trump administration. Lavrov claimed the US might shift focus to other matters, leaving Europe to deal with Ukraine.

title: With over 14 years of civil war, why is history haunting Syria
content: Islamist rebels seized Hama, advancing closer to Damascus in Syria's ongoing civil war. The city holds historical significance due to the 1982 Hama Massacre, where Hafez al-Assad's forces killed thousands. Russia monitors the situation, while Hezbollah pledges support to the Syrian government against the rebels.
summary: Islamist rebels seized Hama, advancing closer to Damascus in Syria's ongoing civil war.  The city holds historical significance due to the 1982 Hama Massacre, where Hafez al-Assad's forces killed thousands.  Russia monitors the situation, while Hezbollah pledges support to the Syrian government against the rebels.

title: US President-elect Donald Trump picks David Perdue as Ambassador to China
content: Former Senator David Perdue has been nominated by President Trump as the next US Ambassador to China. Trump emphasized Perdue's extensive business background, Senate experience, and familiarity with Asia. Perdue expressed honor and readiness to implement Trump's strategy for global peace and represent US interests in China.
summary: Former Senator David Perdue has been nominated by President Trump as the next US Ambassador to China. Trump emphasized Perdue's extensive business background, Senate experience, and familiarity with Asia. Perdue expressed honor and readiness to implement Trump's strategy for global peace and represent US interests in China.

title: 'Trump is very strong person but is not pro-Russian': Russia's foreign minister Sergei Lavrov
content: Russian foreign minister Sergei Lavrov praised former US President Donald Trump's strong personality and straightforward approach, dismissing claims of Trump being a Russian ally. Lavrov highlighted the substantial sanctions imposed on Russia during Trump's presidency. He acknowledged Trump's directness and efficiency, emphasizing his respect for the American people's choice.
summary: Russian foreign minister Sergei Lavrov praised former US President Donald Trump's strong personality and straightforward approach, dismissing claims of Trump being a Russian ally. Lavrov highlighted the substantial sanctions imposed on Russia during Trump's presidency. He acknowledged Trump's directness and efficiency, emphasizing his respect for the American people's choice.

title: World's most expensive Dinosaur fossil arrives in New York with a staggering price tag
content: Billionaire Kenneth Griffin's record-breaking stegosaurus fossil, nicknamed Apex, will be displayed at the American Museum of Natural History for four years. The loan allows public viewing and research access, including 3D scans for scientists. While paleontologists raise concerns about privately owned specimens, the museum emphasizes the fossil's scientific and public value.
summary: Billionaire Kenneth Griffin's record-breaking stegosaurus fossil, nicknamed Apex, will be displayed at the American Museum of Natural History for four years.  The loan allows public viewing and research access, including 3D scans for scientists. While paleontologists raise concerns about privately owned specimens, the museum emphasizes the fossil's scientific and public value.
